events: 24 Hour Events:, Remained tachycardic, unclear etiology. Dilaudid/ativan with no,   change in HR. Prior CT negative for PE, though not a spiral protocol.,   LENI negative for dvt,   History obtained from Medical records,   Patient unable to provide history: severe MR,

24 Hour Events:,   - Unable to get CTA to rule out PE as no peripheral access ([**Doctor First Name 458**] tried,   with US as well),   - Amylase/Lipase not elevated,   - TF increased to 30cc/hr per [**Doctor First Name 458**] recs,   - PM Hct stable at 33.4,   - Ordered for TTE, done this morning,   - Portable abd xray to eval for ileus, poor study, non-specific bowel,   gas pattern,   - CVP around 20 in am, rec'd one dose IV Lasix with good response;,   patient with increased RR later, CVP down to 10 in the evening, around,   1L negative, lungs sounded clear, patient appeared comfortable with HR,   less than 100 so no acute intervention,   - HR improved, has remained hypertensive, RR in the 30s but satting,   well on 1-2L NC to RA, no apparent distress,
